document.full_text: in france, a segment of the population was reported imagining president nicolas sarkozy's hand in the fall of dominique strauss-kahn, the former chief of the international monetary fund.
document.title: politicus: a hatred that will not go away
lines_and_colors: in france, a segment of the population was reported imagining president nicolas sarkozy's hand in the fall of dominique strauss-kahn, the former chief of the international monetary fund.
